page.title: 18EATING OUT IN STEWARTON
page.content: The Millhouse Hotel provides bar lunches as well as purveying for and holding functions. The David Dale restaurant also has lunches and evening meals. In the Main Street the Coffee Pot is where morning coffees, snack lunches and afternoon teas may be had. This is run by two wellknown local singers and Marathon runners, the Brodie sisters. Lauder's the baker's has this year also opened a snack bar. In the two fish and chip shops and the Chinese restaurant many varied meals are available like Scampi Barbeque Ribs and Pakora served with chips or fritters in the cafes and many eastern meals in the Chinese one. At Wardhead Park Hotel outside the town good farmhouse meals are served while at Chapeltoun House high class bar lunches and evening meals. There is one betting shop in Lainshaw Street
